gameDefinitionFileName.description: The name of the file who contain game definition.

certifiedSettingsFileName.description: The name of the file who contain certified settings definition.

variantFileName.description: The name of the file who contain variant definition.

scriptMetaDataFileName.description: The name of the file who contain script meta data definition. Will be ignore if scriptCodeFileName and renderingScriptFileName are missing.

scriptCodeFileName.description: The name of the file who contain script JavaScript code. Will be ignore if scriptMetaDataFileName and renderingScriptFileName are missing.

renderingScriptFileName.description: The name of the file who contain script rendering code. Will be ignore if scriptCodeFileName and renderingScriptFileName are missing.
